comments.body: Is this ok to have two streams to the same file?  I have never tried it,  but would have expected err and out to point to the same stream, instead of having two streams point to the same file.
This was already here, but it's a good question. I guess it's ok since it never gave us problems.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@    Files.createDirectories(configDir)
    val out = new PrintStream(new FileOutputStream(logFile))
    val err = new PrintStream(new FileOutputStream(logFile))
    val stdin = System.in
    val stdout = System.out
